Author: breadndread
Text: Fuckk I did that in highschool. We had to "choose a mental illness" to """research""" (as much research as you can put in a Prezi). All I did was look at thinspo and bmi charts lmaooo

Author: DelicateFknFlower
Text: I did that in 8th grade for an english project and my teacher told me how wonderful it was that I was “bringing attention to a severe issue” like bitch I was just researching their diets to find out how to lose weight lmao
